mapper.insert: insert into usertable (uid, uname, password, email, rtel, question, answer, role, createtime, updatetime) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update usertable set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rtel = #{rtel,jdbcType=CHAR}, question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, uname, password, email, rtel, question, answer, role, createtime, updatetime from usertable
